title: "Blood Jumpers " Flowed in Bangladesh after the Islamic Sacrifice Festival
subtitle: The viral images show the red streets with blood water in parts of Dhaka, Bangladesh, after heavy rains coincided with animal sacrifice rituals on the holy Islamic Eid al-Adha day.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The streets in some parts of Dhaka, Bangladesh, were flooded in bloody waters after mass animal sacrifices occurred on Islamic Eid al-Adha.
